titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes 1977.492
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-11-30 21:52:35 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes
did.abstract: Handwritten minutes from five meetings of the Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League from January through May of 1909.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Harriet Stryker-Rodda from the estate of Dr. George Robson Mott, 1956.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes, 1977.492, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Handwritten minutes from five meetings of the Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League from January through May of 1909. Lists of officers and locations where the meetings were held are also included in the minutes.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection are in the public domain. While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
